name: ASTRA (The beginning)
description:
In the beginning, there was nothing. This fathomless darkness contained naught but cold empty infinite space.

From there, began the Binning, an explosion of light, life and existence birthing a new world full of conflict. Stars and planets, iron and dust all fight to obtain total dominance, locked in an endless drive for existence. You must, as a newly awakened star, attempt to survive this new and vast universe as long as you can, while avoiding enemies and obstacles alike.

Good luck in your attempt to survive...the Binning
